hive_lesson.title: 07 The Weekend
hive_lesson.description: Daniel talks about the weekend.\n(Future Tense / Going to)

hive_text_custom.text: l: I'm good thanks. How are you?
: I'm good. So what are you going to do this weekend?

: Well, on Saturday I think I'm going to go to the gym because I haven't been there for awhile. And then I think I need to clean my house because I didn't have time during the week, and it is a bit messy now. And in the evening, I think I'm going to have dinner with my friends.
: Are you going somewhere after dinner?
: I don't think so. I really want to spend this weekend in a really relaxed way, so I don't think I'm going anywhere after dinner.

: Well, Sunday, I'm not going to do anything in the morning. I really want to take - you know - a rest, and then I'm going to have lunch with my family cause I haven't seen them for awhile, and then in the afternoon, there's this movie I really want to see, so I'm going to the cinema with my friends.

hive_lesson_quiz.question: 1) On Saturday he is going to _____ .
2) He is going to meet his ____.
3) On Sunday he is going to _____.
4) He is going to have lunch with his _____.

hive_vocab.examples:
When are you gong to leave?
Who are you going to talk to?
Why are you going to buy that?

Are you going to come to the party?
Are you going to meet up tomorrow?
Are you going to travel during the break?

I'm going to go to Hawaii.
I'm going to start a business.
I'm going to meet my friend.
I'm not going to work tomorrow.I'm not going to help you.I'm not going to do that.
